title: Himi 291
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ko e ‘ofa mai ‘a Sīsū,
Ki he kakai angahia;
Mo ‘ene ha’ele hifo.
‘O tupu ko e tangata,
Ko e toki me’a ia,
Ke tau fie tokanga’i
Ko e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ki he kakai tō ki lalo.
2.
Na’e kītaki ‘e Sīsū,
‘A e tautau ‘i he ‘akau,
Na’e fai ‘i Kalevale,
Ofi ki Selusalema;
Ko e hifo mahu’inga,
‘A e pekia ‘a Sīsū,
Na’e ‘atu tu’o taha,
Pea lelei fai ma’u ai pē.
3.
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Sīsū, ki he ‘Afiona,
‘I ho ta’e li’ekina,
‘A e kau hiamatea,
Fakafeta’i ‘Eiki Sīsū,
Ke mau fai ‘o ta’e tuku,
‘I ho ‘o ‘ofa tu’unga’a pē,
Ki he kakai angahala. *
